data.title: Publications
data.meta_description: Peer-reviewde scientific sesearch publications available here
data.text:
Publications in Peer-Reviewed Journals:

Please note that all these papers are available on the ResearchGate profiles of Simon Elwen and Tess Gridley and Gui Frainer. We have provided PDF copies here for many of the papers, if they’re not here, check Researchgate or email us!!

In The Review Process

Dines, S., Probert, R., Gullen, A.., Elwen, S.H., Frainer., G., Gridley, T. Hermie The Humpback Dolphin – A Longitudinal Case Study Characterising The Acoustic Behaviour Of An Endangered Indian Ocean Humpback Dolphin (Sousa plumbea)

Martin, M., J. Stow , T. Gridley, A. Immerz, Elwen, S. H., & Charrier, I. (submitted). Use of acoustic signals in Cape fur seal mother-pup reunions: individual signature, signal propagation and pups’ home range.
